status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Transform constructs into Agrobacterium tumefaciens strains that are compatible with vectors. Strain GV3101 is typically used (GV2260 can also be used). Make glycerol stock of.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f72tj","text":"Refresh bacteria containing the construct of interest from glycerol stock on agar YEP (or any other bacterial media such as LB) medium with an appropriate antibiotic. Incubate at 28Â°C for two days. If A. tumefaciens GV3101 is used add rifampicin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":165,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":235,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":201,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transform constructs into Agrobacterium tumefaciens strains that are compatible with vectors. Strain GV3101 is typically used (GV2260 can also be used). Make glycerol stock of.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dn4ec","text":"Inoculate 5 mL of liquid YEP medium with appropriate antibiotic in a test tube. Grow at 28Â°C for 24 hours\nwith shaking at 250-300 rpm. Be sure to grow bacterial strain with p19 as a silencing inhibitor as well!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":53,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":97,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":173,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8q997","text":"Measure the OD600 using 100 ÂµL of bacterial culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":14,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transform constructs into Agrobacterium tumefaciens strains that are compatible with vectors. Strain GV3101 is typically used (GV2260 can also be used). Make glycerol stock of.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fib0r","text":"Calculate the culture volume needed for an OD600 of 0.2 - 0.5 per construct for a 4 mL total volume of Infiltration medium. 4 mL are used for test spot infiltration. The specific OD600 to use depends on how\nwell expressed your construct is in N. benth, the general range is 0.1 â 0.5. Use an OD600 of 0.3 for P19.\n(I use 0.3 for all constructs and it works well).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":45,"length":4},{"style":"sub","offset":181,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":294,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":243,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transform constructs into Agrobacterium tumefaciens strains that are compatible with vectors. Strain GV3101 is typically used (GV2260 can also be used). Make glycerol stock of.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2urjk","text":"Pipette the appropriate volume of each strain together in 2 mL tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5srj2","text":"Centrifuge combined bacteria at 8000Ãg for 2 min at room temperature. Carefully remove all supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":37,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transform constructs into Agrobacterium tumefaciens strains that are compatible with vectors. Strain GV3101 is typically used (GV2260 can also be used). Make glycerol stock of.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6454i","text":"Add 200 mM acetosyringone to the Infiltration medium at a 1:1000 ratio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9bhq","text":"Note: acetosyringone is light-sensitive, keep out of light until ready for use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transform constructs into Agrobacterium tumefaciens strains that are compatible with vectors. Strain GV3101 is typically used (GV2260 can also be used). Make glycerol stock of.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dct77","text":"Add 2 mL of infiltration medium with acetosyringone to each pellet, and resuspend. Leave in the dark at room temperature for 1â2 hrs (or even longer but not overnight). steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fotj9","text":"Grow plants for 2-3 days after infiltration (up to 5 days, depending on expression level of constructs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
